text: Berners-Lee may refer to: * Conway Berners-Lee (1921-2019), British mathematician and computer scientist, father of Tim and Mike Berners-Lee * Tim Berners-Lee (born 1955), British engineer and computer scientist, known for his creation of the World Wide Web *Mike Berners-Lee, English researcher and writer on greenhouse gases ==See also== * 13926 Berners-Lee, main-belt asteroid Category:Compound surnames
title: Berners-Lee
